topics.body:
"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f7d4a56368725c55260100#post_54f7d4a56368725c55260100
Right now, I have no idea.

I was going to take petroleum or chemical engineering but then I got chemistry pretty low (A-) so that's a no go. My dad is always bragging about me taking Telecommunications but thing is that I don't get it.

I always wanted to get Digital Arts but my parents always say "It's OK if it's a hobby!".

Urgh, feels like the only choices without pressure would be Law or Language.
